resources.string: Duru Notes uses your camera to scan documents and capture text using OCR technology, helping you digitize printed text into your notes instantly.
Duru Notes uses your microphone to record voice notes and convert speech to text, making note-taking faster and more convenient.
Duru Notes uses your location to provide location-based reminders, alerting you about important notes when you arrive at or leave specific places.
Duru Notes needs storage access to save attachments, export notes, and import files from other apps.
Duru Notes sends notifications to remind you about your notes at scheduled times or when you reach specific locations.
All your data is encrypted end-to-end for maximum privacy and security.
Voice recognition and OCR processing happens locally on your device.
Duru Notes never shares your personal data with third parties.
Duru Notes requests only the permissions it needs to provide you with the best experience.
Camera access is needed for document scanning. You can enable it in Settings.
Microphone access is needed for voice notes. You can enable it in Settings.
Location access is needed for location-based reminders. You can enable it in Settings.
Storage access is needed for file operations. You can enable it in Settings.
Notification permission is needed for reminders. You can enable it in Settings.
